Package snake.application

Class ResourceProvider

java.lang.Object
snake.application.ResourceProvider
Direct Known Subclasses:
BundleResourceProvider
public abstract class ResourceProvider extends Object
Defines the core behavior of resource providers and provides a base for derived classes.
Author:
Ishan Pranav

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
    protected
    ResourceProvider()
    Called from constructors in derived classes to initialize the ResourceProvider class.
